title: Five-Star Heritage Hertfordshire Country Retreat with Award-Winning Spa & Championship Golf Course
description: Set on a 300-acre estate in the Hertfordshire countryside, The Grove offers the ultimate five-star retreat in the lovingly restored former home of the Earl of Clarendon. Making the most of its acreage, guests are enticed to hit the green on a championship golf course, peruse the expansive activity centre, and lounge beside two pools. Give in to the serene atmosphere with a treatment at Sequoia Spa and dine your way with three onsite restaurants and several unique culinary experiences on offer.
offer_address: Chandler's Cross, Hertfordshire, WD3 4TG, United Kingdom
